txt.en: Nîn-stazg is full of Orcs from Mordor, all working hard to build a deadly offence to be railed against Floodwend.

The forces of Mordor will employ their Orc-slaves for any task, be it soldiers in war or mindless workers to chop wood and assemble weapons. As long as the Orcs endure, the Enemy will never cease to have power.
'My lady Etta has sent us to protect the Thane. He should not go into battle, but he may observe the battle from here, should he wish it.'
'I do not like the presence of these Orcs so near Floodwend! Something must be done.'
Nîn-stazg is full of Orcs from Mordor, all working hard to build a deadly offence to be railed against Floodwend.
Nîn-stazg is south-east of Floodwend, just out of sight of the town's walls.\n\nYou should defeat Orcs at Nîn-stazg to thin their ranks.

The forces of Mordor will employ their Orc-slaves for any task, be it soldiers in war or mindless workers to chop wood and assemble weapons. As long as the Orcs endure, the Enemy will never cease to have power.
